pageProduct.name: Andalou 1000 Roses Absolute Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Flower power for beautiful skin, this potent elixir, with alpine rose stem cells, delivers essential hydration and dermal vitality to soothe and nourish sensitive skin as pomegranate uplifts tone and moisture-binding humectants help revive skin's hydro lipid barrier for a flawless looking complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Serum For Sensitive & Delicate Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Distillate*, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Olive Squalane, Lecithin, Plant Stem Cells (Alpine Rose, Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Bisabolol, Soothing Complex: [Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Boswellia Serrata (Boswellin) Extract], Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil*, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil*, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*, Tocopherol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Rose Isolates, Vanilla Isolates, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Flower Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

AM & PM. Apply lightly on clean face and neck, prior to moisturiser.
